body: Hi Everyone, I was trying to convert a bunch of Breps into HBSurfaces and ran into the following error: 1. Solution exception:'NoneType' object is unsubscriptable I tried troubleshooting the file by testing Breps individually and found the errors occur in the case of Open Breps (especially those which seem to have lines in them). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Arj-j*1Gcz0jODL7COBCy5gXEERH5Cvdi9Al-yxeq4Itqvon3sJPXtWXPBlR*MmpomzyQ7h8tj6aNdzV1-QYhReSWkrXPopZ/219201695857PM.bmp) Closed Breps and Untrimmed surfaces seem to work fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Arj-j*1Gcz0gdLSvmy47w6ULYk7oNjNVEmLJktiTNxx4Ie3McM5OfvKYXl9UPV5ACy7WGhMa8cE9Wsj1yqr7-5KpkilqwfBP/219201695927PM.bmp) Can anyone point me to a solution/workaround for this ? My gh file with internalized geometry is attached. Thanks, Sarith
topic: Errors while converting Breps to HBSurface
